# Build artifacts that can be safely removed or ignored.
# These are generated during the build process.

# The main build directory, containing all compiled files and executables.
build/

# Directory for test results.
Testing/

# Directory where vcpkg installs dependencies.
vcpkg_installed/

# CMake generated files (already in .gitignore)
CMakeFiles/
CMakeCache.txt

# Compiled object files (already in .gitignore)
*.o
*.obj

# Debug and program database files (already in .gitignore)
*.pdb
*.idb
